title: Simon Krogh
text: Simon Krogh (born 27 March 1980) is a <a href="Denmark">Danish</a> <a href="Team%20handball">handballer</a>, currently playing for <a href="Danish%20Handball%20League">Danish Handball League</a> side <a href="Skjern%20H%C3%A5ndbold">Skjern Håndbold</a>. He has previously played for <a href="Danish%20Handball%20League">league</a> rivals <a href="Fredericia%20HK">Fredericia HK</a>.
